entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Http.Sys response header serialization allocations #40215
  • Perf regression: fortunes_ef #40212
  • Blazor AOT publish failed on Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.WebAssembly.dll #40209
  • SQL Connection hang issue with .Net 5 and Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.SqlServer 5.0.1 #40207
    7.0-preview3
  • [Razor] Review usage of cached data in TagHelperDescriptor #40206
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Host blazor webassembly app with different base path is not working as described in documentation #40205
    .NET 7 Planning
  • ResetPassword - move the decode of code to OnPost method #40203
  • Web API error response for malformed json using Text.Json is misleading and is exposing internals. #40202
  • Using StackExchange.Redis as a SignalR backplane - Issues when message to client exceeds a certain size #40200
  • In JS interop, handle ValueTask equivalently as Task #40198
    Backlog
  • OpenAPI C# client generator generates wrong request media type for corresponding deserializer when multiple response content possible. #40197
  • [.Net 6.0.102] dotnet pack - Microsoft.NET.Sdk.Razor.StaticWebAssets.targets NotFoundException #40196
  • [Blazor] More information required on closed ticket #40195
  • IIS does not recover from a broken web.config in v6 hosting bundle where it used to in v3 and v5 #40194
  • Perf regression: json_netty #40193
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_nodejs, json_actix #40192
  • [Docs] More detail for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.ConnectionInfo.RemoteIpAddress` #40191
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor NavigationManager.NavigateTo always scrolls page to the top. #40190
    Backlog

Closed

  • IIS is stuck while restarting local server #25163
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Can we talk about constructor injection now that partial classes are here? #18088
    7.0-preview2
  • Is there something like IIS recycling periodically for Kestrel server on Linux? #40147
  • InputRadioGroup does not support state preservation for child content #31610
    Backlog
  • InputRadioGroup not registering initial click in some circumstances #39145
    7.0-preview2
  • Error "Server timeout elapsed without receiving a message" while calling the invoke method of signalr hubconnection #39811

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40217
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.4
  • Use PackageConflictPreferredPackages for analyzers from transport package #40216
    area-infrastructure
  • Update Microsoft.Data.SqlClient version #40214
    area-infrastructure
  • Allow custom cookie consent value #40213
    area-security, community-contribution, 7.0-preview3
  • Try out Ubuntu 20.04, allowing IDE0055 errors #40210
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • GenerateDisplay doc: what is additionalViewData #40211
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview2
  • Make InputRadioGroup preserve child elements #40148
    area-blazor, 7.0-preview2
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `14aa11d` to `0e40217` #40199
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview2

Updated

  • [release/5.0] Resolve Component Governance bugs #40218
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 5.0.16
  • Add format analyzer for `BindAsync` and `TryParse` custom bindings #37002
    area-infrastructure, stale, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Change log level from warning to debug in UserManager #40178
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Set WebApplication.New().ServerFeatures #40183
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Change log level from warning to debug in SignInManager #40179
    area-identity, community-contribution
  • Add catch parentheses #40138
    area-signalr, community-contribution
  • feat (Minimal) : Add `EmptyResult` #40171
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add analyzer to detect async void usage #40165
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • RenderTreeDiffBuilder – components after components with @key are oft… #40142
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • Complete inner Pipewriter in HttpLoggingMiddleware #39989
    area-runtime
  • Do less copying / zipping for Helix #40134
    area-infrastructure
  • Add nullability to Identity / Identity.UI #40167
    area-identity
  • [WIP] libnethost prototyping #39810
    area-runtime
  • Bump follow-redirects from 1.14.7 to 1.14.8 in /src/SignalR/clients/ts/FunctionalTests #40176
    area-signalr, javascript, feature-blazor-native-dependencies
